articles.title: Two Massive Blobs in Earth's Mantle Baffle Scientists With Their Surprising Properties - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Earth is layered like an onion, with a thin outer crust, a thick viscous mantle, a fluid outer core, and a solid inner core. Within the mantle, there are two massive blob-like structures, roughly on opposite sides of the planet. The blobs, more formally refer…
articles.content: A 3D view of the blob in Earth’s mantle beneath Africa, shown by the red-yellow-orange colors. The cyan color represents the core-mantle boundary, blue signifies the surface, and the transparent gray… [+3599 chars]
